duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of a Registered Issuer client’s project, by running the internal flow and follow up, with minimal oversight.
Partner with Relation Administrators to process Proxy Mailings.
Communicate effectively and prioritize tasks at hand while escalating issues as appropriate in a timely manner.
Develop effective working relationships with team members and internal departments, leveraging diverse perspectives.
Support and contribute to client centric culture, taking responsibility for client satisfaction and retention.
Assist in training new associates and provide guidance with client inquiries.
Participate and deliver presentations related to own professional/technical and business area.
Demonstrate ability to manage multiple concurrent tasks with proficiency.
Participate on assigned projects and special tasks as assigned by management within a set timeframe.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or equivalent
